contentrichtext.text: '''Zbigniew Zaleski''' (born on 29 April 1947 in [[Rogoziniec]]) is a [[Politics of Poland|Polish]] [[politician]] and [[Member of the European Parliament]] for the [[Lublin Voivodship]] with the [[Civic Platform]], part of the [[European People's Party]] and sits on the [[European Parliament]]'s [[Committee on International Trade]]. Zaleski is a substitute for the [[Committee on Development]] and a member of the Delegation for relations with Israel. ==Education== * 1994: Masters (1972), Doctorate (1978) and titular professor of Psychology ==Career== * since 1974: School psychologist (1973–1974) and lecturer at the [[John Paul II Catholic University of Lublin]] * 2002-2004: Regional Councillor of the Voivodship of Lublin * since 1992: Member of the American Psychological Association * since 2003: Founder and Chairman of the European Cooperation Association ''See also:'' [[European Parliament election, 2004 (Poland)]] ==External links== * {{MEP website|www.zbigniewzaleski.pl| of Zbigniew Zaleski:}} * {{EP MEP info/6th term|28300|of Zbigniew Zaleski}} {{Members of the European Parliament 2004–2009}} {{Use dmy dates|date=September 2010}} {{Authority control|VIAF=163206149}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Zaleski, Zbigniew | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = POlish MEp | DATE OF BIRTH = 29 April 1947 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zaleski, Zbigniew}} [[Category:1947 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Civic Platform MEPs]] [[Category:MEPs for Poland 2004–2009]] {{MEP-stub}} {{Poland-politician-stub}}
